meanings.definition: A musical instrument consisting of a wooden board with attached metal keys that are plucked to produce sound.
meanings.sent1: The mbira made beautiful music when the keys were plucked gently.
meanings.sent2: She learned to play the mbira by plucking the metal keys with her fingers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to play the mbira by plucking its tail instead of the keys.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the mbira echoed through the room, like raindrops on a tin roof.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the mbira keys made it a fascinating instrument to observe.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional African music played on the mbira instrument.
meanings.sent1: The mbira music filled the village square with joyful rhythms.
meanings.sent2: Listening to the mbira music always brought a sense of nostalgia.
meanings.sent3: The children danced to the mbira music, their laughter blending with the melodies.
meanings.sent4: Her heart swelled with emotion as the mbira music transported her to distant lands.
meanings.sent5: The soulful notes of the mbira music resonated deeply within her.
